Job Title: HVAC Counter Sales

Location: Southborough, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Ever dream of doing work that makes a difference? Want to join a growing company? Here it is! We seek the talent of a dynamic Counter Sales associate who seeks to bring their A game to a collaborative team of talented professionals. You are not afraid to make impact where your opinion matters in a company that has a masterful, mature history that operates as best-in-class.

Based in Hartford, Connecticut, BellSimons has provided top-notch HVAC products from leading manufacturers to residential and commercial clients since 1940. Their catalog includes a full line of equipment, controls, supplies and replacement parts. Their dedication to quality service and extensive inventory makes them a one-stop shop for all their customers' supply needs. For more information, visit bellsimons.com .

The Counter Sales position provides excellent service to customers primarily via counter sales, and phone, email / online, scanner, and fax communication. The Counter Sales position provides branch operations assistance through merchandising by stocking, picking, pulling, and on time will call assistance. Additionally, the position provides support and information on product inquiry as well as damaged goods, product sold, or product returned. The position effectively utilizes its resources as it relates to company computer systems, online tools, and facility inventory.

We are currently seeking a Counter Sales associate to support our Southborough, MA branch. This role is conveniently located at 150 Cordaville Rd # 130, Southborough, MA 01772 .

What You'll Be Doing

 Completes assigned training successfully and applies learnings as needed and directed  Performs general warehouse work as directed, including working in any and all departments within the branch  Promotes a safe work environment by quickly addressing unsafe conditions such as damaged product, clutter, cleanliness of work area, and clears customer passage  Effectively communicates with management upon arrival and departure for the day, at breaks, and at meal periods including any periods at which they will not be at their work station  Wears proper safety equipment and gear performing proper safety inspections on material handling equipment  Conducts aisle responsibilities as assigned  Conducts timely and frequent queue checks throughout the day, responding in a timely and effective manner 

Preferred Job Requirements

 High School diploma or its GED equivalent and some college in business, sales, or related field  3 or more years’ experience with customer service and related functions.  1 or more years HVAC experience 

Minimum Job Requirements

 High School or its GED equivalent  2 or more years’ experience with customer service and related functions.  Demonstrated knowledge of MS Office suite applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook)  Aptitude for mathematical operations and numerical analysis.  Use computers, photocopiers, scanners, phone systems and meeting and virtual platform sharing relative to the needs of the job.  Minimum keyboarding skills of 40 words per minute 

What's  in it for you?

 Health care (medical, dental, vision, prescription) available the first day of hire!  401k with company contribution  Life insurance plus short-term and long-term disability  HSA/FSA options  Paid vacations, holidays, and personal time  Employee Assistance Program  Employee discounts  And much more! 

All candidates who have received a written offer of employment will be required to undergo background screening and testing for commonly abused controlled substances in accordance with our company’s background check and drug testing policy. Motor Vehicle Record checks are also completed for all candidates who have received a written offer of employment to determine insurability for driving a company vehicle as it relates to the position.

We provide equal opportunities for all employees and applicants for employment without regard to sex, age, race, religion, national origin, citizenship status, sexual orientation, gender identification, physical or mental disability, or any service, past, present, or future, in the uniformed services of the United States.

This employer participates in E-Verify and will provide the federal government with your Form I-9 information to confirm that you are authorized to work in the U.S.

#ZR #IND

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
